quote: I hope you will understand that architecture has nothing to do with the inventions of forms. It is not a playground for children, young or old. Architecture is the real battleground of the spirit.
quote_letters: I HOPE YOU WILL UNDERSTAND THAT ARCHITECTURE HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE INVENTIONS OF FORMS IT IS NOT A PLAYGROUND FOR CHILDREN YOUNG OR OLD ARCHITECTURE IS THE REAL BATTLEGROUND OF THE SPIRIT
